meanings.definition: A member of a legendary nation of female warriors in South America.
meanings.sent1: The amazonians were known for their bravery in battle.
meanings.sent2: I read a story about the amazonians and their fearless leader.
meanings.sent3: The amazonians decided to have a friendly competition to showcase their skills.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of the amazonians, never backing down from a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The image of the amazonians riding into battle on horseback is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Amazon River or the surrounding region.
meanings.sent1: The amazonians landscape was lush and teeming with life.
meanings.sent2: We took a boat ride along the amazonians river, enjoying the sights and sounds.
meanings.sent3: The amazonians wildlife amazed the tourists with its diversity.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset reflected beautifully on the amazonians waters.
meanings.sent5: The amazonians rainforest was a vibrant and thriving ecosystem.
